整套財務報表: a complete set of financial statements

一組類似金融資產: a group of similar financial assets

應計會計報酬率法: accrual accounting rate of return {=AARR} method

報導期間後調整事項: adjusting event after the reporting period

不動產建造協議: agreements for the construction of real estate

美國會計師協會: American Institute of Certified Public Accountants {=AICPA}

長期員工福利基金所持有之資產: assets held by a long-term employee benefit fund

不動產、廠房及設備帳面價值；不動產、廠房及設備帳面金額: book value of property, plant and equipment {=PPE}

共同控制下個體或業務之企業合併: business combination involving entities or businesses under common control

企業合併：收購法或權益結合法之分類: business combinations - classification either as acquisitions or unitings of interests

不動產、廠房及設備帳面價值；不動產、廠房及設備帳面金額: carrying amount of book value of property, plant and equipment {=PPE}

不動產、廠房及設備類別: class of property, plant and equipment

金融工具之分類－或有交割條款: classification of financial instruments – contingent settlement provisions

個人之近親: close members of the family of the individual

礦產資源達到商業價值之數量: commercially viable quantities of mineral resources

一致性：存貨之不同成本公式: consistency - different cost formulas for inventories

合併財務報表及投資子公司之會計: consolidated financial statements and accounting for investments in subsidiaries

得以股份[普通股]或現金交割之合約: contracts that may be settled in [ordinary] shares or cash

收取現金流量之合約權利: contractual right to receive the cash flows

勞務供應商存貨成本: cost of inventories of a service provider

財務報表核准日: date of approval of the financial statements

財務報表發布日: date the financial statements are issued

除役、復原及環境修復基金: decommissioning, restoration and environmental rehabilitation funds

指定為透過損益按公允價值衡量: designation as at fair value through profit or loss

成本標的之直接成本: direct costs of a cost object

待分配予業主之處分群組: disposal groups as held for distribution to owners

分配非現金資產予業主: distributions of non-cash assets to owners

匯率變動之影響: effects of changes in foreign exchange rates

探勘及評估資產成本之要素: elements of cost of exploration and evaluation assets

關聯企業交易未實現損益之消除: elimination of unrealised profits and losses on transactions with associates

權益獎酬福利{即股票或股份獎酬福利}: equity compensation benefits {stock or share compensation benefits}

權益獎酬計畫{即股份或股票獎酬計畫}: equity compensation plans {share or stock compensation plans}

期後事項: events after the balance sheet date

資產負債表日後發生之事項: events occurring after the balance sheet date

礦產資源探勘及評估: exploration for and evaluation of mineral resources

公允價值減處分成本: fair value less costs of disposal

公允價值減出售成本: fair value less costs to sell

公允價值變動列入損益之金融資產或金融負債: financial asset or financial liability at fair value through profit or loss

持有供交易之金融資產或負債: financial asset or liability held for trading

可按公允價值賣回之金融工具: financial instruments puttable at fair value

透過損益按公允價值衡量之金融負債: financial liability at fair value through profit or loss

首次採用國際財務報導準則: first-time adoption of international financial reporting standards

首次適用國際會計準則作為主要會計基礎: first-time application of IASs as the primary basis of accounting

現金流量完全按比例之份額: fully proportionate {pro rata} share of the cash flows

公允價值變動損益: gains or losses from changes in fair values

國外營運機構淨投資之避險: hedges of a net investment in a foreign operation

成本標的之間接成本: indirect costs of a cost object

[停業單位之]原始揭露事件: initial disclosure event [for a discontinuing operation]

租賃隱含利率: interest rate implicit in a lease

國際審計與確信準則理事會: International Auditing and Assurance Standards Board {=IAASB}

國際最高審計機關組織: International Organization of Supreme Audit Institutions {=INTOSAI}

國際內部稽核執業準則: International Standards for the Professional Practice of Internal Auditing

承租人增額借款利率: lessee's incremental borrowing rate of interest

按合約殖利率基礎管理: managed on a contractual yield basis

財務報表整體重大性: materiality for the financial statements as a whole

集團財務報表整體重大性: materiality for the group financial statements as a whole

透過其他綜合損益按公允價值衡量: measured at fair value through othercomprehensive income

導因於財務報導舞弊之不實表達: misstatements resulting from fraudulent financial reporting

導因於挪用資產之不實表達: misstatements resulting from misappropriation of assets

淨確定福利資產淨利息: net interest on the net defined benefit asset

淨確定福利負債淨利息: net interest on the net defined benefitliability

國外營運機構淨投資: net investment in a foreign operation

報導期間後非調整事項: non-adjusting event after the balance sheet date
non-adjusting event after the reporting period

待分配予業主之非流動資產(或處分群組): non-current assets (or disposal groups) as held for distribution to owners

待出售非流動資產及停業單位: non-current assets held for sale and discontinued operations

常態化繼續營業單位稅前淨利: normalized profit before tax from continuing operations

金融資產及金融負債之互抵: offsetting financial assets and financial liabilities

採用國際財務報導準則之初始財務狀況表: opening IFRS statement of financial position

年報內與財務報表並列之其它資訊: other information included in annual reports

利率風險之[投資]組合避險: portfolio hedge of interest rate risk

出售資產之實際能力: practical ability to sell the asset

確定福利義務之現值: present value of a defined benefit obligation

按持股比例計算之淨資產: pro rata share of the net assets

機率與大小成比例選樣: probability proportional to size sample selection {=PPS}

用以瞭解內部控制之程序: procedures to obtain an understanding of internal control

會計實務質性層面: qualitative aspects of the entity's accounting practices

退還資金或減少未來提撥金: refund or a reduction in future contributions

淨確定福利資產再衡量數: remeasurements of the net defined benefit asset

淨確定福利負債再衡量數: remeasurements of the net defined benefit liability

[員工福利計畫之]退休基金資產報酬: return on plan assets [of an employee benefit plan]

股本－再取得之本身權益工具{庫藏股}: share capital-reacquired own equity instruments {Treasury Shares}

估計係數之標準差: standard error of the estimated coefficient

損益及其他綜合損益表: statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income

會計及核閱服務準則公報: statements on standards for accounting and review services {=SSARs}

簽證服務準則公報: statements on standards for attestation engagements {=SSAE}

露天礦場於生產階段之剝除成本: stripping costs in the production phase of a surface mine

目標投資報酬率: target rate of return on investment

礦產資源開採之技術可行性及商業價值: technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting a mineral resource

匯率變動之影響: the effects of changes in foreign exchange rates

修正式無保留意見: unqualified audit report with explanatory paragraph or modified wording

當期流通在外普通股加權平均股數: weighted average number of ordinaryshares outstanding during the period
